maqras.text: 19|59|Te'omlokara pichata ahila ayogya bansadhara, yisakale chalata binasta karaile arau kuprabrttira anusarana karaile. Seye acirae'i sihamte ksatigrastatara sanmukhina ha’ba.
19|60|Kintu se'isakala lokara bahirae, yisakale ta'oba karaiche, imana aniche arau satkarma karaiche. Te'omloke'i jannatata praraesa karaiba. Te'omlokara prati kono an'yaya karaa naha’ba.
19|61|E'ito cirasthayi jannata, yara gayebi pratisrauti parama karaunamaye te'omra bandasakalaka pradana karaichila. Niscaya te'omra pratisrauti bisaya arasyambharai.
19|62|Tata te'omloka chalama tatha santira bahirae ana kono asara bakya sunibalai napaba arau tata puraa-gadhuli te'omlokara babe thakiba te'omlokara raijikba (ahara).
19|63|E'itorae se'i jannata, yara adhikarai karaima amara bandasakalara majata te'omlokaka, yisakala muttakbi.

19|64|Arau ami aponara pratipalakara adesa abihane aratarana nakarao; amara sanmukhata yi ache arau pichaphale yi ache lagate e'i duyora majata yi ache se'i sakalo te'omrae'i; arau aponara raba bismrta nahaya.

19|65|Teraemi akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora majata yi ache se'i sakalorae raba. Seye kerala te'omrae'i ibadata karaka arau te'omra ibadatata dhairya dharana karaka. Apuni te'omra samanama guna sampanna karaobaka janene
19|66|arau manuhe kaya, ‘ma'i mrtyubarana karaile moka akau jiraita arasthata uthoraa ha’ba neki’
19|67|manuhe smarana nakarae neki ye, ami taka iyara purbe srsti karaicho athaca si ekorae'i nachila
19|68|Eteke tomara pratipalakara sapata! Arasye ami sihamtaka arau cayatanasakalaka ekelage samabeta karaima, tara pichata ami sihamtaka natajanu arasthata jahannamara carai'ophale upasthita karaima.
19|69|Tara pichata pratyeka dalara majara paraa yijana rahamanara sarbadhika abadhya ami taka tani uliya'i anima.
19|70|Arau amihe bhalakai jano sihamtaka, yisakala jahannamata dagdha horaara bechi upayukta.
19|71|Arau tomalokara pratyeke'i tara (jahannamara) oparaedi atikrama karaiba; e'ito tomara pratipalakara curanta sid'dhanta.
19|72|Tara pichata ami ud'dhara karaima te'omlokaka, yisakale takbaraa aralambana karaiche arau yalimasakalaka tata natajanu arasthata raakhi dima.

19|73|Arau sihamtara ocarata amara spasta ayatasamuha tilarata karaa ha’le kaphirasakale muminasakalaka kaya, ‘(amara) du'i dalara majata maryadata kona sraestha arau kara sabha bechi jakajamakatapurna’
19|74|arau sihamtara purbe ami bahu manaragosthika binasa karaicho—yisakala sihamtatakai sampada arau bahyadrstita sraestha achila.

19|75|Koraa, ‘yisakale bibhraantita ache, parama karaunamaye sihamtaka pracura arakasa diba, arasesata yetiya sihamte seya pratyaksabharae dekhibalai paba yi bisaye sihamtaka satarka karaa haichila, seya sastiye'i ha'omka ba kiyamate'i ha'omka, tetiyahe sihamte janibalai paba maryadara ksetrata kona nikrsta arau dalabalara ksetrata kona durbala’.

19|76|Arau yisakale satpathata cale allahe te'omlokara hidayata brd'dhi karai diye; arau sthayi satkarmasamuha tomara pratipalakara puraskara praaptira babe sraestha arau parainatira phalerae'o ati uttama.
19|77|Tumi se'ijana byaktika dekhichane, yiye amara ayatasamuha asbikara karae arau kaya, ‘arasye moka dhana-sampada arau santana-santati diya ha’ba’.
19|78|Si gayeba samparke arahita haiche neki, ne rahamanara paraa kono pratisrauti labha karaiche
19|79|ketiya'o nahaya, si yi kaya ami seya likhi raakhima arau tara sasti brd'dhihe karai thakima.
19|80|Arau si yi (dhana-sampada, janabalara katha) kaya, (tara mrtyura pichata) seya thakiba amara adhikarata arau si akalasaraiya hai amara ocarata upasthita habahi.
19|81|Arau sihamte allahara bahirae bahuto ilaha grahana karaiche, yate se'ibora sihamtara sahayaka haya
19|82|ketiya'o nahaya, anatipalame sihamte (upasyaborae) sihamtara ibadata asbikara karaiba arau sihamtara biraodhi hai yaba.
19|83|Tumi laksya karaa na'ine, ami kaphirasakalara babe cayatanaboraka erai thaicho, sihamtaka beya kamata bisesabharae pralubdha karaara babe
19|84|eteke sihamtara bisaye tumi kharakheda nakaraiba. Arasye ami sihamtara nirdharaita kala ganana karai acho
19|85|yidina rahamanara ocarata muttakbisakalaka sanmanita atithiraupe ami samabeta karaima
19|86|arau aparaadhibilakaka trsnatura arasthata jahannamara phale khedi niya ha’ba.
19|87|Yisakale rahamanara paraa pratisrauti laiche, te'omlokara bahirae kone'o chuparaicha karaiba noraaraiba.
19|88|Arau sihamte kaya, ‘rahamane santana grahana karaiche’.
19|89|Arasye tomaloke eta bibhatsa bisayara aratarana karaicha
19|90|yara phalata akasasamuha bidirna hai yoraara upakrama haya, arau prthirai khanda-bikhanda ha’ba arau pahara-parbata curna-bicurna hai yaba
19|91|e'i karane ye, sihamte rahamanara prati santana araopa karaiche.
19|92|Athaca santana grahana karaa rahamanara babe sobhaniya nahaya.
19|93|Akasasamuha arau prthiraita enekuraa kono na'i yiye rahamanara ocarata bandaraupe upasthita naha’ba.
19|94|Te'om sihamtara sankhya jane arau te'om sihamtaka bisesabharae ganana karai thaiche
19|95|arau kiyamatara dina sihamta sakalorae te'omra ocarata akalasaraiya hai ahiba.
19|96|Niscaya yisakale imana aniche arau satkarma karaiche rahamane arasye te'omlokara babe (bandasakalara hrdayata) bhalaporaa srsti karaiba.
19|97|Arau ami tomara bhasata kora'anaka sahaja karai dicho yate tumi iyara dbaraa muttakbisakalaka susambada diba paraa arau bitandapraiya sampradayaka iyara dbaraa satarka karaiba paraa.
19|98|Arau sihamtara purbe ami kimana ye prajanmaka binasa karaicho! Tumi sihamtara karaobara astitba anubhara karaichane athaba ksinatakaiyo ksina kono sabda sunibalai poraa ne
